title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their small town.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in a medieval fantasy world.

title: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter navigates a world filled with magic and political intrigue.

title: Dark
description: A mind-bending time travel story set in a small German town.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans a heist on the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Sherlock
description: A modern adaptation of Sherlock Holmes solving crimes in London.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A bounty hunter explores the galaxy in the Star Wars universe.

title: Westworld
description: A futuristic theme park where AI gains consciousness.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The story of a small-time lawyer before Breaking Bad.

title: The Office
description: A hilarious look at office life in Scranton, Pennsylvania.

title: Friends
description: A sitcom about six friends navigating life in New York City.

title: The Boys
description: A gritty take on superheroes abusing their power.

title: Arcane
description: A visually stunning series based on League of Legends.

title: House of the Dragon
description: A prequel to Game of Thrones about House Targaryen.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family in post-WWI Birmingham, England.

title: Loki
description: The god of mischief embarks on a time-bending adventure.

title: Black Mirror
description: A dystopian look at modern society and technology.

title: Narcos
description: The rise and fall of the infamous drug kingpin Pablo Escobar.

title: Attack on Titan
description: A battle between humanity and giant man-eating Titans.
